regen.absent_element: action of handling invalid project IDs
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user if an entered project ID does not exist.

regen.absent_element: verification of the generated project/bridge list and context of use within Pontis
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify the accuracy and coherence of the generated project/bridge list within Pontis, ensuring it aligns with user specifications and is usable in further processes.
The system shall provide visual confirmation when a project is selected on the map.

label: SQL errors will be reported to the user for correction.
